wikipedia_page.main: Sir Harold "Hooky" Berners Walker,  (born 19 October 1932) is a British former diplomat. He served as British Ambassador to Bahrain (1979–81), the United Arab Emirates (1981–86), Ethiopia (1986-1990) and finally Iraq (1990–91).

response: *Harold Berners Walker (born 1932), former British Ambassador to Iraq, Bahrain and the UAE, son of Admiral Harold Walker
* Harold Berners Walker, HM Ambassador, Bahrain.
*Harold Berners Walker, C.M.G., lately H.M. Ambassador, Baghdad.
